name: HSV Color Slider
description: Gradient slider for HSV color component control (hue, saturation, value, alpha).

use: you need a standalone HSV slider.
avoid: you need full color picker UI (use `color_picker`).

examples.minimal:
HSVColorSlider(
  value: HSVColor.fromColor(Colors.blue),
  sliderType: HSVColorSliderType.hue,
  onChanged: (color) {},
)

theming: Uses shared theme for sizing and alpha pattern.
accessibility: Provide labels for sliders when used in forms.
do: Use `sliderType` to target a single channel.
dont: Combine HSV and HSL sliders without clear labeling.
